cmp: 那 (how/which, that/those, that/those/(sometimes used before a measure word, especially in Beijing))
mng: (particle equivalent to 啊 after noun ending in -n)
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)

exm.mng: where?, somewhere, anywhere, wherever, nowhere (negative answer to question), humble expression denying compliment
where?, somewhere, anywhere, wherever, nowhere (negative answer to question), humble expression denying compliment, also written 哪裡|哪里
even, even if, even though, no matter how
